Garbage containers - lorem ipsum dolor sit
  • Made from high-quality and durable polyethylene, spacious and at the same time lightweight, they have all the necessary characteristics for durable use.
  • The combination of lightness, strength and wear resistance, simplicity and ease of use makes these tanks an ideal choice for those who value reliability and quality
  • Various sizes of shower tanks (110, 150 and 200 liters) allow you to choose the best option depending on your needs.
  • Simple installation and quick dismantling without additional tools, convenient maintenance makes the use of these tanks as comfortable as possible.
  • Thanks to the resistance to corrosion, temperature changes and aggressive influences, you can be sure of a long service life of the tanks.
Every day we ship from 35 tanks

Own production. We are a large manufacturing plant and can offer very favorable conditions

Individual offers for your business
Delivery of I-Plast products
The I-Plast company offers 2 options for delivery and shipment of goods:
Pickup
You can pick up your order yourself at one of the company’s warehouses, a list of which is listed in the “Contacts” section.
Delivery by company transport
Terms, conditions and cost of delivery are calculated individually, depending on the volume of the order and the region of destination.
